citeinfo.origin: Alaska Department of Fish and Game (ADF&G), Habitat and Restoration Division
citeinfo.title: Special Areas ATLAS - ADF&G

descript.abstract: Data Type: Boundaries; The Special Areas Atlas provides maps and legal descriptions of Alaska's 31 state game refuges, critical habitat areas, and game sanctuaries, six of which are contained within NBS Ecosystem initiative areas.

idinfo.accconst: Subject to provisions of Alaska Administrative Code on disclosure of public records and subject to Department of Fish and Game Standard Operating Procedure on public information. Free hard copies are available.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metac: Subject to provisions of Alaska Administrative Code on disclosure of public records and subject to Department of Fish and Game Standard Operating Procedure on public information. Free hard copies are available.
